data.name: Mephisto
data.description: The wheelin', dealin' ruler of Hell, Mephisto exploits human weakness to bring out the evil in them, tempting them into infernal contracts that make their wildest dreams come true. But the devil always takes his due, and any who come across him are left scarred, unable to Heal from his influence.

starItems.name: Mephisto
starItems.description: The wheelin', dealin' ruler of Hell, Mephisto exploits human weakness to bring out the evil in them, tempting them into infernal contracts that make their wildest dreams come true. But the devil always takes his due, and any who come across him are left scarred, unable to Heal from his influence.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>. This damage reduces the Max Health of the target by the same amount.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent enemy for <color=#86e619>30%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>. This damage reduces the Max Health of any targets by the same amount.

If any attack is a Crit, gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

Gain <color=#86e619>+1</color> <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, this attack always Crits.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked or counterattacked.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>. This damage reduces the Max Health of the target by the same amount.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent enemy for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>. This damage reduces the Max Health of any targets by the same amount.

If any attack is a Crit, gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

Gain <color=#86e619>+1</color> <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, this attack always Crits.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked or counterattacked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>125%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn. This damage reduces the Max Health of the target by the same amount.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent enemy for <color=#86e619>75%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>. This damage reduces the Max Health of any targets by the same amount.

If any attack is a Crit, gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

Gain <color=#86e619>+1</color> <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, this attack always Crits.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked or counterattacked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
If any attack is a Crit, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked or counterattacked.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>. This damage reduces the Max Health of the target by the same amount.

For this character and all Ghost Rider, Ghost Rider (Robbie), and Cosmic Ghost Rider allies:
 > Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect to a positive effect.
 > Heal for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

If this character has any <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies. If this character does not have any <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> ally with the highest Health.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all allies.

Mind Control the enemy with the highest Damage to attack the primary target. The controlled character gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage for this attack.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to all enemies

1.description:
For all <color=#fff568>MYTHIC</color> enemies:
 > Apply <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color>.
 > Flip <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage. This damage reduces the Max Health of the target by the same amount.

Clear all Battlefield Effects on allied side and apply the Battlefield Effect, <color=#FF5D00>Mark of Mephisto</color>, to allied side.

<color=#FF5D00>Mark of Mephisto</color>:
 > On any Turn, Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of that character's Max Health.
 > Allies gain <color=#86e619>+50%</color> Drain and Armor.
 > Allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>.
 > Allies cannot have their Speed Bar reduced.
 > This Battlefield Effect lasts until cleared or until the end of the match.

1.description:
This character cannot be revived. While this character is alive, allies and enemies cannot be revived.

On Spawn, if this character is not a Clone and does not have <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>666%</color> Speed until this character's first turn + if this character has any <color=#fff568>MYTHIC</color> enemies, gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On this character's first turn, if this character is not a Clone and did not spawn with <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, become <color=#fff568>Empowered</color>.

The first time this character gains <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
When this character or an ally drops below <color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from that character.

On any non-summoned Death, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>10</color>.
For each <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Armor, Damage, Focus, and Resistance.

Enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
Enemies with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> cannot fill Speed Bar for themselves or allies (this does not apply to Speed Bar gained through normal means).
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>0%</color> Max Barrier
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health
Allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of target's Max Health. This damage reduces the Max Health of the target by the same amount.

Lose <color=#fff568>Empowered</color>.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of target's Max Health + apply <color=#9055ff>Vulnerable</color>. This damage reduces the Max Health of the target by the same amount.

Lose <color=#fff568>Empowered</color>.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of target's Max Health + apply <color=#9055ff>Vulnerable</color>. This damage reduces the Max Health of the target by the same amount.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Lose <color=#fff568>Empowered</color>.
3.nextUpgrade: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of target's Max Health

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of target's Max Health + apply <color=#9055ff>Vulnerable</color>. This damage reduces the Max Health of the target by the same amount.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Lose <color=#fff568>Empowered</color>.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of target's Max Health + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#9055ff>Vulnerable</color>. This damage reduces the Max Health of the target by the same amount.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Lose <color=#fff568>Empowered</color>.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of target's Max Health + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#9055ff>Vulnerable</color>. This damage reduces the Max Health of the target by the same amount.

7.description:

Gain +<color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Lose <color=#fff568>Empowered</color>.

1.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> to primary target.

Lose <color=#fff568>Empowered</color>.

Enemies with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color>:
 > Cannot fill Speed Bar for themselves or allies (this does not apply to Speed Bar gained through normal means). (This effect persists as long as this character is alive.)
1.nextUpgrade: <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> to an adjacent enemy

2.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> to primary target + <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> to an adjacent enemy.

Lose <color=#fff568>Empowered</color>.

Enemies with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color>:
 > Cannot fill Speed Bar for themselves or allies (this does not apply to Speed Bar gained through normal means). (This effect persists as long as this character is alive.)
2.nextUpgrade: <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> to an adjacent enemy

3.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> to primary target + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> to an adjacent enemy.

Lose <color=#fff568>Empowered</color>.

Enemies with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color>:
 > Cannot fill Speed Bar for themselves or allies (this does not apply to Speed Bar gained through normal means). (This effect persists as long as this character is alive.)
3.nextUpgrade: <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> to an adjacent enemy

4.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> to primary target + <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> to an adjacent enemy.

Lose <color=#fff568>Empowered</color>.

Enemies with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color>:
 > Cannot fill Speed Bar for themselves or allies (this does not apply to Speed Bar gained through normal means). (This effect persists as long as this character is alive.)

5.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> to primary target and adjacent enemies.

Lose <color=#fff568>Empowered</color>.

Enemies with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color>:
 > Cannot fill Speed Bar for themselves or allies (this does not apply to Speed Bar gained through normal means). (This effect persists as long as this character is alive.)

6.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> to primary target and adjacent enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> to all <color=#fff568>MYTHIC</color> enemies.

Lose <color=#fff568>Empowered</color>.

Enemies with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color>:
 > Cannot fill Speed Bar for themselves or allies (this does not apply to Speed Bar gained through normal means). (This effect persists as long as this character is alive.)

7.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> to primary target and adjacent enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> to all <color=#fff568>MYTHIC</color> enemies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Lose <color=#fff568>Empowered</color>.

Enemies with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color>:
 > Cannot fill Speed Bar for themselves or allies (this does not apply to Speed Bar gained through normal means). (This effect persists as long as this character is alive.)

1.nextUpgrade: <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random enemy

2.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color> to primary target + <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random enemy.

Lose <color=#fff568>Empowered</color>.
2.nextUpgrade: <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random enemy

3.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color> to primary target + <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random enemy.

Lose <color=#fff568>Empowered</color>.

4.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color> to primary target and <color=#86e619>1</color> random enemy.

Lose <color=#fff568>Empowered</color>.
4.nextUpgrade: <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color> to an additional random enemy

5.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color> to primary target and <color=#86e619>1</color> random enemy + <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color> to an additional random enemy.

Lose <color=#fff568>Empowered</color>.
5.nextUpgrade: <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color> to an additional random enemy

6.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color> to primary target and <color=#86e619>1</color> random enemy + <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color> to an additional random enemy.

Lose <color=#fff568>Empowered</color>.

1.description:
This character cannot be revived. While this character is alive, allies and enemies cannot be revived.

When this character loses <color=#fff568>Empowered</color>, apply the Battlefield Effect, <color=#FF5D00>Mark of Mephisto</color>, to allied side.

On non-summoned ally or enemy Death, gain <color=#86e619>+1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>10</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Armor, Damage, Focus, and Resistance per <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character.

<color=#FF5D00>Mark of Mephisto</color>:
 > On any Turn, Barrier all allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of that character's Max Health.
 > Allies gain <color=#86e619>+50%</color> Drain and Armor.
 > Allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>.
 > Allies cannot have their Speed Bar reduced.
 > This Battlefield Effect lasts until cleared or until the end of the match.
